bibl.title: A Note on a Hematite Falcon in the Louvre.
bibl.note: Suppl. Mag. I, 6. Hematite statuette of Horus made in the Pharaonic era, but re-used during the Roman period by a priest for a new purpose and inscribed with an apotropaic spell in Greek with voces magicae that contain some Coptic.
bibl.seg: SKEEN Bradley A., A Note on a Hematite Falcon in the Louvre.

Suppl. Mag. I, 6. Hematite statuette of Horus made in the Pharaonic era, but re-used during the Roman period by a priest for a new purpose and inscribed with an apotropaic spell in Greek with voces magicae that contain some Coptic.
